title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
text:
It doesn‚Äôt matter if you are an under-graduate student or a working professional.

title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
section: How is this course different from others?
text:
How is this course different from others?
There are many online courses on Udemy, Coursera, Edureka etc., which are probably priced the same or even less than this course. Then why should you take this course‚ùì

title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
text:
What will you get?






üéì Expert-Curated Curriculum





The course content has been specially curated by Vishal Katti, who is also the Instructor for this course. The course introduces the most used features and some hidden gems which most people are unaware. The Instructor demonstrates some game-changing feature-combos across Excel, PowerPoint and Word.
Course Plan
Day 1

Introduction to MS Excel
MS Excel Basics (Tables, Charts, Formula, Functions)

Day 2

Excel Advanced (Pivot Tables, PowerQuery)
Introduction to Excel VBA (Macro Programming)
Bonus track

Day 3

Introduction to MS PowerPoint
MS PowerPoint Basics (Animations, Transitions, 3D Models)
Bonus track

Day 4

Introduction to MS Word
MS Word Basic (Table of Contents, Insert Tables, Images, Linking, Mail Merge)
Bonus Track

Day 5

Answering the question ‚ÄúWhere will I use this?‚Äù
Walk-through of AI Tools for enhanced learning
Doubt Clearing and Career Guidance













üöÄ LIVE Webinar with Hands-On Experience with Labs.





This course is going to be Live, which means you will be able to interact with the Instructor in real-time. No more recorded videos where the presenter doesn‚Äôt pay attention to you or your chat messages!!









üí¨ Multilingual Interaction





The Instructor is well-versed in English, Hindi, Marathi and Kannada. He also understands Konkani and Punjabi but not enough to respond in the same language. This means that you can ask a question in any of these languages and expect an answer to your specific question immediately.









üåü Personalized Attention





With a small batch size of only 20 participants, the Instructor promises that you get personalized attention guaranteeing an experience worth every penny! Get answers to all your questions and more!









üòé AI Tools





The Instructor will demonstrate a curated list of AI Tools which will help not only cement your learning but also help boost your productivity while using Excel, PowerPoint and Word!









‚ú® Bonus Resources





üéì Certificate of Completion (T&C Apply)
üéØ Guided Workbook for Practicing Excel Functions worth $500
‚ö° Excel Add-in with Time-saving VBA Macros worth $1000
ü§© 50 ready-to-use PowerPoint Templates worth $200
üí≤ A Referral Code to earn your money back!!!




Great! Sign Me Up!

title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
text:
Batch Timings
Registrations are currently open for June, July and August 2024 batches.
It is a 1-week program from Monday to Friday, from 9:00 PM - 11:00 PM Indian Standard Time (IST).

title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
text:
Enroll Now!!






Terms and Conditions






Deadline for Registration: The final date for registration for a batch is 2 days before the start of the batch
Cancellation Policy: Should a registrant wish to cancel their registration; they may do so freely until the aforementioned deadline and get a FULL REFUND. Any cancellation requests received after this time will get PARTIAL REFUND of their Registration Fees minus a penalty of ‚Çπ 500/- up until the commencement of the course. Once a batch starts, all registrations become final, and NO REFUND will be issued under any circumstances.
Change of Batch: This is subject to availability of free slots in other scheduled batches.
Punctuality and Attendance: Participants are expected to adhere to scheduled session times punctually, respecting the time commitments of all involved.
Live Course Content: We encourage participants to engage actively during sessions, as the course is conducted live and does not offer recorded content for review.
Certificate of Completion: Participants who attend all 5 days of a batch and submit the final assignment within 7 days of batch completion will be given a Certificate of Completion
